author: time news
title: The Eerily Hot and Breathtaking Experience of Exploring an Alien-Like Crater on Earth - timenews
text: 2023-12-29 00:01:25 Astronomer Discovers Exoplanets with Similar Environment to Earth’s Crater In a groundbreaking discovery, astronomers have found planets outside our solar system with an environment rich in methane gas, similar to the conditions found in a crater here on Earth. The discovery has sparked excitement among researchers who are searching for extraterrestrial life. The mission, which took place in November 2013, was led by astronomer Koronis, who described the nerve-wracking moments leading up to the discovery. He recounted the intense preparation, including wearing a heat recovery suit, a self-contained breathing apparatus, and a custom-made climbing harness to withstand extreme heat. Upon reaching the crater, Koronis was struck by the surreal and otherworldly scene. He described the vast desert landscape suddenly transforming into a blazing pit, emitting searing heat and roaring sounds of gas bubbling under high pressure. The flames burned cleanly, providing an unobscured view of the spectacle. Koronis emphasized the overwhelming feeling of smallness and vulnerability in the face of such intense natural phenomena. The discovery has prompted further exploration and study of the planets with similar environments, as astronomers hope to gain insight into the potential for extraterrestrial life in these distant realms. The implications of this discovery could have far-reaching effects on our understanding of the universe and the possibility of life beyond Earth. For more on this discovery and related subjects, visit the following links: – What did the first people who dared to go down the sinkhole “hell’s well” find? – Map of Sha’ari Shaul: ten hidden openings in the world that “lead to hell” The search for extraterrestrial life continues to captivate and drive scientific exploration, and this recent discovery adds an exciting new dimension to the quest. #Entered #Gate #Hell #prove #existence #aliens

author: Jonathan McCambridge
title: Irish Sea border remains after Stormont deal, claims loyalist Jamie Bryson
text: A meeting of unionists and loyalists opposed to the DUP deal which will restore the Stormont powersharing institutions has been told that the so-called Irish Sea border remains. Around 120 people gathered at Moygashel Orange Hall in [Co Tyrone ](https://www.belfastlive.co.uk/all-about/co-tyrone)for a meeting which was addressed by TUV leader Jim Allister and loyalist activist Jamie Bryson. Among those in attendance was former [DUP](https://www.belfastlive.co.uk/all-about/dup) minister Jim Wells. The DUP has given the green light for the recall of the Stormont Assembly, with powersharing due to be [ restored in Northern Ireland on Saturday.](https://www.belfastlive.co.uk/news/northern-ireland/stormont-speaker-confirms-assembly-return-28553625) Read more: [Stormont Speaker confirms Assembly will return this weekend](https://www.belfastlive.co.uk/news/northern-ireland/stormont-speaker-confirms-assembly-return-28553625) Read more: [Poll: Have your say on the first priority for the NI Assembly](https://www.belfastlive.co.uk/news/northern-ireland/what-should-stormonts-first-priority-28544387) The move comes after the DUP agreed a package of measures with the UK Government that party leader Sir Jeffrey Donaldson says has effectively removed the trading border for goods moving from Great Britain to, and staying in, Northern Ireland. Mr Bryson told the meeting: “The DUP MLAs will be (Northern Ireland) Protocol implementers; playing a full and active role in the operation of the very thing which every unionist agrees dismantles the Union as we know it. “And one of those MLAs, whoever that may be, will debase themselves and become joint head of an administration, alongside [Sinn Fein](https://www.belfastlive.co.uk/all-about/sinn-fein), that will have a legal duty to build border posts, operate border posts and implement the subjugation of the Acts of Union. “Here is the test for the unionist and loyalist people: if Sir Jeffrey Donaldson cannot convince Nigel Dodds, a DUP stalwart, on what basis can he hope to convince everyone else? “The Irish Sea border remains with full force.” Mr Bryson also said EU law would continue to apply in Northern Ireland. “We remain subject to laws we did not make and cannot change. “Every unionist now faces a choice: you implement the Irish Sea border for sake of pragmatism, or you stand against, come what may, as a matter of principle. “I have made my choice, and I hope all in this hall make the same one. Stand firm, don’t give in.” Mr Allister told the meeting [Northern Ireland](https://www.belfastlive.co.uk/news/northern-ireland/) had been subjected to “the most astounding level of spin and hype”. He added: “Northern Ireland tonight remains a rule-taker from Brussels. “Control has not been taken back, sovereignty has been surrendered to Brussels over that vast panoply of laws which govern a significant part of our economy. “Because they are EU laws, they are the identical laws that govern the same sphere of the economy in the Irish Republic. “We now, as far as our goods economy is concerned, are ruled by precisely the same laws as the Irish Republic, not ruled by British laws, ruled by those foreign EU laws that we didn’t make and can’t change.” Mr Allister said the [ Stormont ](https://www.belfastlive.co.uk/all-about/stormont)brake element of the Windsor Framework, a veto on new EU laws applying in Northern Ireland was “useless”. “It does not even apply to those laws already in place, it only applies, allegedly, to any alterations of those laws. “What is the constitutional significance of Northern Ireland being governed by laws we don’t make and can’t change? The whole idea of being a sovereign country is that you make your own laws. “Northern Ireland is now, in constitutional terms, what would be described as a condominium. That’s to say we are ruled in part by UK laws and we are ruled in part by EU laws. “We are now ruled in that section of our economy like a colony of the EU.” Join our Belfast Live breaking news service on WhatsApp [Click this link](https://chat.whatsapp.com/LU5TE4vC7DOJ3M6yruB11W) or scan the QR code to receive breaking news and top stories from Belfast Live. We also treat our community members to special offers, promotions, and adverts from us and our partners. If you don’t like our community, you can check out any time you like. If you’re curious, you can read our [Privacy Notice](https://www.reachplc.com/site-services/privacy-policy). For all the latest news, visit the Belfast Live homepage [here.](https://www.belfastlive.co.uk/) To sign up to our FREE newsletters, see [here.](https://www.belfastlive.co.uk/newsletter-preference-centre/)

author: FUNKE Mediengruppe
title: Australien: Surfer von einsamer Insel gerettet - „Einmal-in-einer-Million-Wunder"
text:
Berlin. Der 19-Jährige kommt von einem Surf-Ausflug nicht zurück. Dann startet eine aufwendige Suchaktion – mit unerwartetem Ausgang.
Es ist der Albtraum eines jeden Surfers: Von der Strömung erfasst zu werden und es nicht zurück zur Küste zu schaffen. Nun hat dieses Schicksal offenbar einen 19-jährigen Australier ereilt. Der 19-Jährige, dessen Namen örtliche Medien mit Darcy Deefholts angeben, war den Berichten zufolge am Mittwochnachmittag von Zuhause zum Surfen an einem Strand in Wooli, 480 Kilometer nördlich von Sydney, aufgebrochen.
Ein FUNKE Liebe
Alle zwei Wochen sonntags: Antworten auf Beziehungsfragen – ehrlich, nah und alltagstauglich.
„Als er nicht nach Hause kam, kontaktierten besorgte Angehörige die Beamten“, teilte die Polizei von New South Wales mit. Daraufhin startete eine aufwendige Suchaktion an Land und auf dem Meer. Mit Erfolg: Der junge Mann wurde auf einer unbewohnten Insel kilometerweit vor der australisischen Küste entdeckt und gerettet.
Die Rettung seines Sohnes sei ein „Einmal-in-einer-Million-Wunder“, sagte der Vater des 19-jährigen Surfers der in Sydney erscheinenden Zeitung „Daily Telegraph“. Zuvor hatte der Vater in Online-Netzwerken mit Blick auf seinen vermissten Sohn erklärt, er befürchte das Schlimmste. Wie der Vater dem „Daily Telegraph“ weiter sagte, wurde der 19-Jährige nach seiner Rettung medizinisch betreut.
lro/AFP

author: Rabbi Nicole Guzik
title: A Bisl Torah - A Bisl New Year
text:
The heaviness of the year feels palpable.
We continue to pray for the release of the hostages, experience waves of Jew hatred, and mull over what already existed pre-Covid: loneliness, isolation and indifference.
And yet, I have seen and experienced so much hope: hundreds of people coming together to celebrate Shabbat and holidays, people of various faiths reaching out to offer comfort and strength, and beautiful acts of kindness exchanged between strangers and friends.
The world feels confusing. But we have the power within our hands to direct our future. A future filled with endless potential and opportunities. A future filled with advocacy and support. A future that includes our voice and our heart.
Rabbi Noah Weinberg once said, “People often avoid making decisions out of fear of making a mistake. Actually the failure to make decisions is one of life’s biggest mistakes.” May 2024 be a year of wise decision making, taking risks, living with optimism and fierce determination. Let us walk into this new year both grateful for what we have and what we will continue to bring to the world.
Happy New Year and Shabbat Shalom

author: Mariona Gumpert
title: Lo que no veremos de los Juegos Olímpicos… O sí
text: Lo que no veremos de los Juegos Olímpicos… O sí Nuestra memoria es cada día más corta, pero hace tan sólo dos años de los robos, emboscadas, disturbios y ataques que emprendieron los «vecinos del barrio» contra los aficionados del Real Madrid y el Liverpool Actualizada 01:30 París está sitiada militarmente. Para los que todavía viven en la inopia, la ciudad de la Luz dejó su esencia atrás hace tan sólo un par de décadas. Por supuesto, y en teoría, las imágenes que veremos en nuestras pantallas no reflejarán esta dura realidad; hay acuerdos entre los poderes franceses legalmente reconocidos y los clanes y mafias para establecer un alto el fuego durante estos días. A pesar de todo, estos últimos no controlan la delincuencia menor y desorganizada. Los lobos solitarios han sido, en teoría, expulsados de la ciudad o detenidos. Aún así, estos esfuerzos son tan sólo un intento de poner puertas al campo. Hay barrios a los que el turista no debería acudir bajo ningún concepto. Nuestra memoria es cada día más corta, pero hace tan sólo dos años de los robos, emboscadas, disturbios y ataques que emprendieron los «vecinos del barrio» contra los aficionados del Real Madrid y el Liverpool que acudieron a ver la final de la Champions. A pesar de esto, el campo de fútbol de Saint-Denis donde sucedió todo esto será estadio olímpico en estos juegos. Una asociación de mujeres (Collectif Nemesis) divulga en redes estos días un mensaje en diferentes idiomas: «Si eres una mujer, y vienes a Francia para los JJ.OO. debes ver este vídeo. En Ille-de-France en 2019 el 63% de las agresiones sexuales y el 93% de los robos en el transporte público fueron cometidos por extranjeros. […] Seguramente querrás asistir a uno de los espectáculos más emblemáticos de París, la torre Eiffel iluminada de noche. Las innumerables violaciones en el Champ-de-Mars, de las cuales muchas turistas han sido víctimas- deberían quitarte las ganas. […] El día a día de las francesas ya es un calvario. Prevemos lo peor para los JJ. OO. Aquí tienes algunos consejos que tenemos para ti; no salgas sola por la noche. Consigue un pequeño spray de pimienta y mantenlo siempre en tu bolsillo. Ten mucho cuidado en los lugares atractivos como El Champ de Mars, El Champs Elysées, La rue Rivoli, La Basílica de Saint Denis o Châtelet Les Halles, tristemente conocidas por sus numerosos carteristas y agresiones de todo tipo. Evita sacar tu teléfono u objetos costosos en la calle, sobre todo las joyas. Lleva zapatos deportivos de recambio cuando uses zapatos de tacón altos. No uses auriculares para estar atenta a tu entorno. Lamentamos tener que hacer este vídeo, pero sentimos la necesidad de hacerlo. El estado no parece preocuparse por las consecuencias desastrosas de la política migratoria francesa sobre la seguridad de las mujeres, así que debemos tomar nuestras propias medidas con este vídeo de prevención. Somos una asociación feminista francesa, denunciamos la islamización y la inmigración masiva. Somos las verdaderas feministas, pero somos perseguidas por nuestras opiniones en Francia. Ayúdanos a difundir nuestro mensaje, liberadnos de nuestra inmigración.» Quizá alguno pueda pensar que esta asociación de mujeres es xenófoba y fascista. Y lo seguirá creyendo, a pesar del pésimo espectáculo que dieron los espectadores del pasado partido de fútbol Argentina-Marruecos: petardos de considerable calibre volaban desde las gradas al campo de juego. A pesar de los robos que han sufrido ya diferentes deportistas mientras entrenaban. A pesar del destrozo con hurtos de uno de los coches de un ciclista de la selección australiana. A pesar de la turista australiana violada a pocos metros del Moulin Rouge por un grupo de cinco hombres. Los venezolanos -y demás hermanos hispanoamericanos- no son los únicos que vienen del futuro para advertirnos sobre lo que se nos viene encima. Ahora -desde hace tiempo, de hecho- son los europeos los que nos alertan. En saco roto, por supuesto. También nos avisan desde ciertas partes de España, como Lavapiés en Madrid, el Rabal o el barrio Gótico en Barcelona, distintas zonas de Sevilla, Gibraltar, Almería, etc. Los cayucos que se dirigen a nuestras costas son cada vez más numerosos, entre otras cosas porque tienen cierta seguridad de estar apoyados por las mafias, en connivencia con ONG’s de dudosa honradez. ¿Qué respuesta dan nuestros gobernantes y la ciudadanía ante una situación como ésta? ¿Escarmentamos en cabeza ajena? Dejemos reposar este texto, para poder digerir las respuestas a estas dos preguntas en la siguiente entrega. Disfruten del viernes.

author: Idoya Noain
title: Netanyahu ordena a l’Exèrcit continuar atacant el Líban amb "plena força"
text: Netanyahu ordena a l’Exèrcit continuar atacant el Líban amb "plena força" El primer ministre israelià desatén els esforços per a un alto el foc i diu que no s’aturarà fins a assolir tots els seus objectius / Abbàs insta a parar "aquesta bogeria" en un discurs crític amb els EUA El primer ministre israelià, Benjamin Netanyahu, va aterrar ahir a Nova York, on avui intervindrà davant l’Assemblea General de l’ONU, amb un missatge contundent que no deixava cap dubte sobre les seves intencions. "La política d’Israel és clara. Continuarem atacant Hezbol·là amb plena força. I no ens aturarem fins que no aconseguim tots els nostres objectius, el principal el retorn segur a les seves llars de tots els residents del nord". Amb aquestes declaracions i mentre avancen els preparatius militars per a una possible invasió terrestre del Líban, els esforços internacionals es queden sense gairebé marge. Dimecres Estats Units i França, avalats per Austràlia, el Canadà, la Unió Europea, Alemanya, Itàlia, el Japó, l’Aràbia Saudita, els Emirats Àrabs Units i Qatar van presentar una petició per a una treva de 21 dies entre Israel i Hezbol·là. Aquest document conjunt apressava a "donar espai la diplomàcia" per treballar en un alto el foc definitiu i evitar l’extensió regional de la guerra. El secretari de Defensa dels EUA, Lloyd Austin, va reconèixer en una roda de premsa a Londres que el risc a què s’enfronta és "una guerra a plena escala" però va assegurar també que "una solució diplomàtica encara és viable" i va instar totes les parts a "aprofitar l’oportunitat". De moment és una crida, com tantes altres llançades l’últim any, sense resposta. Mentre avui s’espera la intervenció de Netanyahu a l’Assemblea General, ahir va prendre la paraula el president palestí, Mahmud Abbàs, que va ser rebut amb una gran ovació i va ser acomiadat també amb aplaudiments i crits de "Palestina lliure" després de tancar el discurs amb una idea: "Palestina serà lliure. L’ocupació acabarà". Aquesta recepció tornava a exposar a l’ONU el suport majoritari que tenen els palestins en la comunitat internacional. També, el rebuig dominant de la guerra llançada per Israel després dels atacs de Hamàs del 7 d’octubre, un conflicte que ja ha deixat a Gaza més de 40.000 morts i una demolidora tragèdia humanitària i que ara amenaça d’estendre’s al Líban i convertir-se en una guerra regional a plena escala. "No marxarem" "No marxarem. No marxarem. No marxarem. Palestina és la nostra terra, és la terra dels nostres pares i els nostres avis. Seguirà sent-ho. I si algú marxa, serà els usurpadors que ocupen", va començar dient Abbàs. La intervenció d’Abbàs, que va lletrejar i va condemnar "la guerra de genocidi" tant a Gaza com al Líban i la recrudescència de les agressions militars i dels colons a Cisjordània servia, no obstant, com a recordatori també de la incapacitat de l’ONU per posar fre a Israel. I el líder palestí va assegurar que per l’incompliment de les resolucions de l’ONU el país "·no mereix ser un membre" de l’organització, a la qual va aprofitar per reclamar també la imposició de sancions. Abbàs va assenyalar amb especial duresa també als Estats Units, que continua utilitzant el seu poder de veto en el Consell de Seguretat per protegir Tel Aviv i, com va recordar el líder palestí, tres vegades va frenar la resolució que hauria obligat Israel a complir un alto el foc i va impedir també que pogués avançar la proposta de reconeixement de Palestina com a estat de ple dret. "Mentre els EUA continuïn recolzant-los, ¿per què no seguir?", va plantejar en un moment. Abbàs va fer més reclamacions, incloent-hi una crida que "es deixi d’enviar armes a Israel" amb les quals, va recordar, s’ha matat ja 15.000 nens i dones i persones grans. I va presentar un pla de 12 punts per a l’endemà del final de la guerra, un dels punts del qual és l’atribució exclusiva a l’Autoritat Palestina i al seu partit, l’OAP, de la "representació legítima" del poder i l’autoritat sobre tots els territoris. No va fer menció de Hamàs, que governa a la Franja. En un altre moment de la seva intervenció Abbàs va assegurar: "Aquesta bogeria no pot continuar". Però la "bogeria" continua i es àmplia i l’amenaça d’extensió de la guerra és molt real, especialment després de l’escalada al Líban. "Continuarem lluitant amb totes les nostres forces contra l’organització terrorista Hezbol·là fins a la victòria i el retorn segur dels habitants del nord a les seves llars", va assegurar també a la xarxa social X el ministre d’Afers Exteriors Israel Katz, que exerceix de manera interina com a primer ministre en absència de Benjamin Netanyahu. - [Compte enrere d’una espanyola per anar a l’espai](https://www.elperiodico.cat/ca/societat/20240926/compte-enrere-d-espanyola-per-108624724) - [El 5 i 6 d'octubre](https://www.elperiodico.cat/ca/mes-barcelona/20240926/viu-montjuic-un-cap-de-108471843)[Viu Montjuïc, un cap de setmana d'art i natura a Barcelona.](https://www.elperiodico.cat/ca/mes-barcelona/20240926/viu-montjuic-un-cap-de-108471843) - [Netanyahu ordena a l’Exèrcit continuar atacant el Líban amb "plena força"](https://www.elperiodico.cat/ca/internacional/20240927/netanyahu-ordena-l-exercit-continuar-108625394) - [La ‘podcaster’ sexual i l’home de Déu](https://www.elperiodico.cat/ca/oci-i-cultura/20240927/podcaster-sexual-l-home-deu-108625773) - [Biden no dona llum verda a Zelenski per usar en territori rus míssils de llarg abast](https://www.elperiodico.cat/ca/internacional/20240927/biden-dona-llum-verda-zelenski-108625435)

author: Michelle Devani
title: How to Make Your Ex Boyfriend Dump His New Girlfriend
text:
Move on is not easy. If you find yourself here, you are the living proof of how hard moving on from your ex boyfriend could be. You just realized that you made a rush decision breaking up with him and now you wish you still together. While you are having a hard time to get over him, turns out he already find a new bae. Much to your surprise, isn't he move on too fast.
Since you can't move on from him yet, it is unfair that he has a new girlfriend. So that you start to find ways how to make your ex boyfriend dump his new girlfriend. Whether you want to get back with him or simply want revenge, these tips may help you:
1. Plan a Strategy
Before making a move, it's important for you to plan a perfect strategy. Thoroughly plan all the means and possibility. Don't act out of rush unless you want your plan to fail right away. It's important to stay calm and build your strength little by little. You want him to realize that you are way better than his girlfriend, so that you better not showing any wicked thing to him. See also How to Make Your Ex Boyfriend Regret Breaking Up With You And Want You Back
2. Set a No Contact Rule
If you think that the best way to make him break up right away with his new girlfriend is by intensely communicating with him then you're wrong. It only makes things worse and get him annoyed. Instead, you have to cut all the contacts with him. No contacts will not make you away from him or losing your chance. During the no contacts period, hide yourself perfectly from him. If it's necessary, take a break from the social media.
3. Think If He Really Worth It
Only you know what's your real intention in making your ex boyfriend dump his new girlfriend. Whatever it is, rethink again if he's really deserve it. If you want to take revenge, think about how you broke up? Did he hurt you? Did he that bad of a person that deserve it?
If you want to get back together with him, does he really worth it? You need to set you motives clear before you put into an action. See also What to Text Your Ex Boyfriend When You Miss Him and Want to Reconnect
4. Keep His Social Media
Once you break up, the first thing you do must be erasing him from your life. But it's not always wise to do that. When you have deleted his number, you better keep his social media if you still want to know what he's up to. You don't have to like his post or anything. Just leave it there.
5. Make Him Miss You
Is it possible for your ex boyfriend to miss you when he has date a new person? Of course it is. It's a good start to test the water. Remind him of you by updating your social media after a long time break. He'll notice it and if he likes your post or send you DM after that, he has probably been missing you. See also What to Do When My Ex Boyfriend Is Ignoring Me but I Want Him Back
6. Initiate a Contact with Him
If he reach you first, respond it positively. But if he hasn't show any signs of initiating a contact, then you go first. To make things less suspicious, you start by telling him sorry and that you don't want to leave any bad things behind. Tell him you want to resolve things maturely.
7. Leave His Relationship Alone
During those first contact after a long time with him, avoid talking about his new relationship. You can congratulate him and stop right there. Don't ever ask about how long they've been dating, how is his relationship, or what he likes from his girlfriend. You only makes things obvious if you can't stay out of it. See also Why Does My Ex Keep Contacting Me When He Dumped Me
8. Show Him How Happy You are
Even if your ex boyfriend has moved on from you, it's still hurt to see that you're happy. Nobody knows whether he still likes you or not. It's important for you to let him know that you're very happy at the moment. Post it to your social media so that he watch it himself. He may think how can you be happy without him.
9. Don't Backstab His Girlfriend
Rather than play fast, it's better to play safe. It's what you should do. Just because you run out of patient trying to break him up with his new girlfriend, you choose to take a shortcut and backstabbing his girlfriend. It's too risky and once your ex boyfriend find this out, it only makes his relationship stronger and break up seems impossible. Instead, you appear as a wicked witch in front of his eyes. See also How to Get Back Your Ex Boyfriend after He Dumped You
10. Improve Your Appearance
You better focus on yourself. During the no contact time, improve your appearance. Men are visual being. They are easily attracted to something beautiful. Make yourself prettier by working out to shape your body, get a fresh haircut, and put on some make up. Do a little strong makeover unless he won't notice it.
11. Don't Make It Too Obvious
Once again, don't make things too obvious. No need to beg him to break up with his girlfriend on talking ill about her all the time when you don't know her well. Instead of succeeding, it only makes him running away from you, closing your chance right away.
12. Spread News Through His Friends
Make sure you have changed for the better. Not only by appearance but also by attitude. Show him that you are more mature than you used to be, becoming someone that he wished back then. But let the news spread through his friends. It will make him curious and want to see you in person.
There are many other ways how to make your ex boyfriend dump his new girlfriend. But it's important for you to do it rightly. Don't create a scenario where you bashed your ex boyfriend or his new girlfriend. You have to be wise and remember that karma does exist. Ruining others' relationship do you no good.

author: VNExplorer
title: MoD’s £10-a-shot laser beam which will ‘revolutionise warfare’ fired for first time
text:
The DragonFire laser weapon uses electric power, meaning it does not require ammunition – Ministry of Defence
A £10-a-shot high-powered laser beam that will “revolutionise the battlespace” has been successfully fired for the first time.
The DragonFire’s high-power firing of a laser weapon against aerial targets during a trial at the Ministry of Defence’s Hebrides Range was a UK first.
The weapon, developed by Qinetiq, the UK defence contractor, is being developed to hit missiles, drones and other enemy targets.
By using electric power, it does not require ammunition, which is seen as an advantage at a time when the West is burning through missile stockpiles by donating them to Ukraine.
Grant Shapps, the Defence Secretary, said: “This type of cutting-edge weaponry has the potential to revolutionise the battlespace by reducing the reliance on expensive ammunition, while also lowering the risk of collateral damage.”
He added that such advanced technologies were “crucial in a highly contested world,” and helped the UK to “maintain the battle-winning edge and keep the nation safe”.
The weapon’s range is classified, but it is highly accurate and reportedly capable of hitting any visible target – Ministry of Defence
Laser-directed energy weapons can engage targets at the speed of light and use an intense beam of light to cut through the target, leading to structural failure or more impactful results if the warhead is targeted.
In 2017, a £30 million contract was awarded to the DragonFire consortium to demonstrate the potential of the laser weapons.
The cost of operating the laser is typically less than £10 per shot, which means it has the potential to be a long-term low-cost alternative to certain tasks missiles currently carry out.
In comparison, the Sea Viper missiles that were shot from HMS Diamond in the Red Sea to take down the Iranian-backed Houthis drones and missiles cost roughly £1 million each.
The DragonFire weapon system is the result of a £100 million joint investment by the Ministry of Defence and industry.
Although the range of the DragonFire is classified, it can engage with any visible target. The precision is equivalent to hitting a pound coin from a kilometre away.
The MoD said the tests demonstrated the ability to engage aerial targets at relevant ranges and was a major step in bringing the technology, which is being considered by the British Army and Royal Navy, into service.
The latest milestone builds on a series of successful trials, including the first static high-power laser firing, and demonstration of the DragonFire system’s ability to track moving air and sea targets with very high accuracy.
The latest trial was sponsored by the MoD’s Defence Science and Technology (DST) organisation and Strategic Programmes.
Dr Paul Hollinshead, DST Laboratory chief executive, said: “These trials have seen us take a huge step forward in realising the potential opportunities and understanding the threats posed by directed energy weapons.”
%n

author: Malay Mail - World
title: Pope Francis' health concerns: A closer look at his medical history | Nestia
text: VATICAN CITY, Feb 15 —Pope Francis’ hospitalisation yesterday for treatment of bronchitis was the latest in a long history of health problems the 88-year-old pontiff has had over the years. Below are some details:Lung and respiratory tractWhen he was 21, the then Jorge Bergoglio developed pleurisy and had part of one of his lungs removed in Argentina.

author: Ignacio Guerra
title: Sistema frontal llega con fuerza a la RM y provoca caída de árboles y voladura de techos: Hay más de 500 mil clientes sin luz
text:
Caídas de ramas y árboles, voladora de techumbres e incluso el colapso de antenas. Esas son algunas de las consecuencias que ha dejado el sistema frontal, que en estos momentos azota con fuerza a la Región Metropolitana.
El temporal hizo presencia primero en la capital con la llegada de fuertes ráfagas de viento, que provocaron una serie de estragos, principalmente en la zona oriente de Santiago.
Dicha situación generó cortes de calles y la interrupción del suministro eléctrico en varias comunas de la capital.
Según el balance que entregó la Superintendencia de Electricidad y Combustibles (SEC) a través de su sitio web, hasta ahora se reportan 548.030 clientes sin luz en Santiago, a causa del frente de mal tiempo.
Junto con esto, el Aeropuerto de Santiago ha sufrido una serie de afectaciones, debiendo interrumpir de manera momentánea el arribo y la salida de aviones. Mientras que algunos vuelos debieron ser derivados hacia otras locaciones para evitar inconvenientes al aterrizar.
La mayoría de estas consecuencias han sido provocadas por el viento, ya que las lluvias no han caído con tanta intensidad hasta ahora en la capital.
En ese sentido, la Dirección Meteorológica de Chile informó que el viento podría registrar ráfagas de hasta 90 kilómetros por hora tanto en la RM como en O'Higgins, por lo que emitió una alerta meteorológica.
Senapred, por su parte, hizo un llamado "a la población a informarse sobre las condiciones del tiempo; y alejarse del tendido eléctrico, grandes árboles y carteles publicitarios, ya que podrían colapsar debido al viento".
